summary:
Craft a Wooden Ladle at a Tanning Rack from 1 Firewood. (Now includes a Cast Iron Pot recipe)
No longer needed for Frostfall 2.0 or newer.
descriptionHtml:
!!! This mod is no longer needed to craft cooking gear in Frostfall 2.0 or newer. However, the file will remain available for those that choose to use an older version. !!!

Mod requested by korbe2012

Lets you craft a Wooden Ladle at a Tanning Rack from 1 Firewood.
Intended for [url="http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11163"]Frostfall[/url] (pre - v2.0) users who want to craft their own cooking pot from raw materials.

----------------
Changelog
-----------------

1.1
-Added recipe for a Cast Iron Pot (1 Iron ingot at a forge)

------------
Install
------------

Use NMM

OR

Extract LadleCraft.rar to your ...Skyrim/Data folder
author: Dudeman325

files.name: LadleCraft 1-1
files.changelogHtml: added recipe: Cast Iron Pot (1 Iron Ingot Forge)
